sourcesContent:
# Description Email Created Needed till Technology Status
{{a.id}} {{getDescription(a?.description)}} {{a.email}} {{toDate(a.created) | date: 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'}} {{toDate(a.neededTill) | date: 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'}} {{a.technology?.type}} {{a.status}}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Application } from '../model/application.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-table', templateUrl: './table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./table.component.css'] }) export class TableComponent { @Input() applications: Array = []; toDate(value: number) : Date { return new Date(value); } getDescription(value: any) : string { return value ? value : "-"; } }
